name: Bangladesh, CoxBazar
details: Coxs Bazar is the longest sea beach around world.It is the closest sea beach to the town. At here a traveler can easily enjoy the scenic beauty of Bay of Bengal Sea. Its a place for enjoyment, many people including foreigners come here around the year.Things to Do in Coxs Bazar : - go to inani beach, drive in marine drive

name: Bangladesh, Sundarban
details: The Sundarbans is the largest contiguous block of mangrove forest in the world. It is a playground of heavenly beauty bestowed by nature. In Bangladesh tourism, Sundarbans play the most vital role. A large number of foreigners come to Bangladesh every year only to visit this unique mangrove forest. Beside, local tourist also goes to visit Sundarbans every year. It is located on the south-west part along the Bay of Bengal of Bangladesh. The Sundarbans is the single mangrove forest in the world. The area of Sundarbans is approximately 6017 sq. km. The exciting events in the Sundarbans tour are hiking in the deep forest, country boat cruising, bird watching, night safari and campfires and also staying on vessel at wild jungle atmosphere which will definitely add to your adventure experience.

name: Bangladesh ,Sajek
details: Who does not want to be lost in a white cloud-like cotton? Sajek Valley, currently the most popular destination for pilgrims/travelers, is located in the biggest union of Bangladesh, Baghaichari Upazila of Rangamati district. It is on the border of Mizoram in the north of Rangamati district. The north side of Sajek is Tripura, Langadu of Rangamati on the south, Mizoram of India on the east, Khagrachori Dighinala on the west. The height of Sajek Valley from sea level is 1800 feet. Though the location of Sajek is in Rangamati district, it is very easy to travel from Dighinala to Khagrachari due to geographical reasons. Sajek is 70km away from Khagrachari district and 40 kilometers from Dighinala. If you want to go to Sajek, you will have to get permission from the Baghaihat Police or Army camp.

name: Bangladesh, Sreemongol
details: The panoramic Surma valley of Sreemangal in Sylhet is famous for her great natural attraction. Sreemangal is popularly known as the land of two leaves and a bud. This is an ideal place for Eco-tourism with a tropical rain forest of Lawachara which support a large number of plant species, exotic wild animals and enchanting birds. Here you will find the worldâ€™s largest tea gardens, colorful orange and pineapple gardens, the most fascinating tribal people like Monipuri, Tripura, Khashia and Garo and the vast natural lake like Haka Luki or Hail hawrs will be the prime attraction for the nature loving tourists. The enchanting Madhabkundu waterfall and the wildlife sanctuary at Remakalenga Reserve forest will be an additional and rewarding experience for the tourists while visiting these virgin hill valleys bordering the Tripura hills of India.

name: India, Goa
details: Enjoy the beach tan. Explore the historic aspects by visiting Chapora Fort.Get closer to nature by visiting Dudhsagar Falls. ...Enjoy the nightlife of Goa.Try water sports. ... Saturday night market. ... Visit Basilica Of Bom Jesus. Visit the Casino.

name: Westbengal india, Darjeeling
details: Darjeeling is well known for quite a few items, mainly their large selection of tea and woollen items such as shawls, scarves, hats and jackets. Darjeeling also offers a lot of handicrafts and exotic Tibetan items that are great souvenirs to take back home.

name: Inida, Tajmahal
details: Taj Mahal, one of the top heritage attractions of India, can be visited throughout the year. ... Taj Mahal opens 30 minutes before sunrise and closes 30 minutes before sunset. It is closed for general viewing to all visitors on Fridays.

name: switzerland, The Matterhorn
details: The tour begins in Randa and leads anticlockwise around the pyramid-shaped peak, revealing the iconic mountains many different facets. A tour de force for expert and fit hikers with extensive experience of the high mountains. 60 hours of hiking, 13,000 vertical metres and 148 effective kilometres: a supreme adventure!

name: SriLanka, Hikkadua beach
details: The beaches in Hikkaduwa have been attracting tourists since the 1960s when it was first discovered. The beach stretches on spanning over kilometers and hosts many fun activities to keep the tourists engaged. These water sports include snorkeling and scuba diving for the adventure seekers. The clear waters beckon the nature lovers who wish to take a dip inside the waters to witness the vibrant,
